#summary How to create and use SQLite database in Android.

== Archiving ==

Compress SQLite database file by [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/7Zip 7Zip] using parameters: 
{{{ 
Compression method: LZMA
Dictionary: 8 MB
}}}

{{{
Source: ruwikt20110521_android.sqlite
Result: ruwikt20110521_android_sqlite.zip
}}}

You can download `ruwikt20XXXXXX_android_sqlite.zip` file (see section "Downloads"). It contains machine-readable wiktionary + 1 small table for Android applications (see "Preparing the SQLite database for Android" at [File_mean_semrel_empty_sql]).
